Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Acura360> 🚀🎉 NEWS: We have done cross chain test successfully with MoMoM. Moving coins from one chain to another without any atomic swap. The chains should be running same cc cluster. i.e.: -ac_cc=3. This requires MoMoM data and notarization and not instant. The duration would be around 15 minutes max depending on notarization speed for those chains. There are about 3 waits, first for export tx to be confirmed, then for notarisation of export and backnotarisation, then for 2 notarisations on target chain.
We also have 3 new komodo API call to make this work.🚀 🎉

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Kaichichow> Would there be a way to make liquidity and matching easier for our dex? Say person A wants to swap from ARK to OMG. 
Instead of just putting up an order to sell ark for omg, would the system be able to bring in person B?
So if person A is wanting to swap ARK to OMG, and no current orders available. 
Person B wants to go from OMG to NEO
Person C wants NEO for ARK. 
Would a system be able to be implemented where person A B and C are automatically matched and swapped? Seeing as fees are low enough for multiple trades to reach the endgoal outcome?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> I dont know if im talking out my ass my brains a bit sizzled atm

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> But I think it makes sense? LOL

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> Wait dont worry it doesnt work 😂😂

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Kaichichow> Il try simplify it. Persons 1 2 and 3. Tokens a b and c. 
Person 1 wants to swap a to b
2 wants b to c
3 wants c to a
1 gives 2 his A, 2 gives 3 his c, and 3 gives 1 his A

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> So like a way to match 3 or 4 people together and either automatically have the coins swapped to respective wallets, or for it to be done automatically but through the whole process. So 1 and 2 swap, then 2 and 3, then 3 and 1

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> Would that make liquidity a lot higher? Momom? Matching of matching of match? 😂

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> Or even having an order sold for bitcoin/kmd, then that coin to coin wanted, except its all automated so as long as bitcoin or kmd (or any coin) is a major pair or has better liquidity than other coins, it would help out more obscure pairs like if someone wanted to swap EXP for STRAT or some low volume coins together

Content: [telegram] <Kaichichow> Just having it as an option like "allow double trade" or someshit
